statements: UPDATE public_opinion_survey SET political_party='Republican', issue_1_sentiment=5 WHERE survey_id=1;

UPDATE public_opinion_surveys SET response = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE voter_sentiment SET sentiment_score = 8 WHERE sentiment_id = 'a6e5c191-8b9f-491d-8eaf-21c027acf951';
UPDATE public_opinion_surveys SET survey_date = '2023-10-15', response = 'Agree' WHERE survey_id = '3ee4d060-9a28-4af9-b93b-ab5d202413ec';

UPDATE survey_data SET opinion_1 = 'Agree', political_party = 'Republican' WHERE voter_id = 101;
UPDATE political_issues SET opinion_rating = 5, issue_topic = 'Healthcare' WHERE issue_id = 1;
UPDATE survey_data SET opinion_1 = 'Agree', opinion_2 = 'Disagree' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE political_issues SET opinion_rating = 4 WHERE issue_id = 3;
UPDATE voters SET age = 25, party_affiliation = 'Republican' WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE issues SET issue_description = 'This issue is of utmost importance' WHERE issue_id = 3;
UPDATE voters SET age = age + 1 WHERE voter_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE political_parties SET party_leader = 'Jane Smith' WHERE party_id = 2

UPDATE SurveyParticipants SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE participant_id = 2;
